ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, this reminds me of the other night when i tried to do the hero bracer quest.  my faction was not high enough, so hmm what do i do, he wont give me the
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, this reminds me of the other night when i tried to do the hero bracer
quest. my faction was not high enough, so hmm what do i do, he wont give me
the quest... i head over to blackburrow and mem sleep song, go down to the
bridge/main room and then run around pull a huge train. I want faction
baby.... i told everyone around me to kill what they wanted from it. Well
lets just put it this way, Sleep affects way more then just 4. I cause so
much spam it was crazy, and everyone was jumping gnolls that were so mad at
me putting them to sleep they were begging for more. Between the Head nod
spam and the faction spam, i lost maybe half a bub of health at the most in
all the trains i got (3-4 of em of 20+ gnolls). Everyone was having fun
around me. Except this one snooty goodie two shoed nerdy erudian paladin
sends me a tell saying he's reported me for purposely making trains. so i
said out loud that i had asked everyone around if they minded them and they
all were backing me up and wanted more of em since they were getting lotsa
easy xp without getting hurt, not 1 person died in all my pulls since i had
a huge crowd of gnolls after me and very few of em actually left the mob of
em on me. Then he tells me to F*** myself out loud.... i said fine, i just
did a /report and he promply logged out.... funny how you can never please
everyone.

Anyways, i still wasnt able to do the quest even though amiable to me, i
think he dont like wood elves.

Minkin Nehoc
Sol Ro
Lev 36 questing fool

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [SMTP:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 2:32 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> I'm starting to notice this more and more. You can pretty much tell when
> everyone in your group is attacking the same mob by their orientation
> towards the mob. A lot of the time, I get the "head nods" message for all
> the mobs but the extra mobs that should be asleep keep attacking. Very
> disappointing.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > mumble, mumble, mumble. Pixie Strike is BROKEN. So is Lullaby. I was
> > TRYING to use Lullaby in Cazic-Thule last night and I'd get a "nods"
> > message
> > for EVERY mob and then get hit by two or three. This is really
> > aggravating.
> > It's gotten so my groups are saying "That song's not useful, quit using
> > it."
> >
> >
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
